description: Nishimura Taichi is a unique magician with no aptitude for any of the magical elements. However, his magical strength and capacity is off the scale, which he utilizes to enhance his physical abilities in battle. He happens to be unperceptive toward the affections of others, as well as believing that http://anidb.net/ch101271 [Rin], who came with him, only views him as a friend.
name: Nishimura Taichi
